name: Sunny and Luna (Gandi IDE)
description:
A fun game for the Scratch Game Jam #3

This game is a Demo. If  it does well, updates might be a thing and also a download for the music (I assure you that the music is lower quality because of Scratch) 🎮

In the next update, if there is one, will be : new levels, new events, hardcore difficulty and polishing the game.
